body_html:
#767 (which #782 was a dupe of) is fixed now. I think we should go with the original suggestion of an object, addons, which has keys of the add-on IDs and values of the type of add-on object we are using in in driver.addons.get() (see #747).

In flow notation:

/* @flow */
type AddonId = string;
type Addons = {
  [AddonId]: {
    id: AddonId,
    installDate: Date,
    isActive: boolean
    name: string,
    type: "extension" | "theme" | "webextension" | ...,
    version: string,
  }
}

@Osmose thoughts?
